    Bus Route

    The wheels on the bus go 'round and 'round.

    User Stories

    • As a user, I should be able to log-in to my account to set my child up for a semi-daily bus pick-up.
    • My child won't have to take the bus on Fridays, because he'll get a ride from a family member.
    • As a user, I need to see how much I'm spending each week to make sure it's accurate and track my budgeting.
    • Since this is for my school attending child, there will be holidays and breaks that my child won't be going to school.
    • As an administrator, I need to see what customers in my zip code will be taking the bus.
    • As an administrator, I'll need a GPS integration to see where these stops are being made.
    • As an administrator, there will have to be some sort of payment method involved like PayPal or Stripe.
